blocks.name: arisum
blocks.content: Arithmetic series sum of the first ` N ` positive integers. This is Metamath 100 proof #68. (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm arisum(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl6eq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), csu(hs0, co(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  fsumshftm(s0, hs0, nat1, c0, cv(s0), nat1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  1zzd(wcel(c0, cn))
  nnz(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcnd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
  elfzelz(cv(s0), nat1, c0)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  sumeq1i(hs0, co(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  oveq1i(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat0)
  1m1e0()
  eqtr4d(csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0)), cbc, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  sumeq2dv(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0)), cbc, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0)), cbc, cv(hs0)), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cbc, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cbc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  bcnp1n(cv(hs0))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cbc, cv(hs0), co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  nn0cnd(cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  elfznn0(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  ax-1cn()
  addcom(cv(hs0), nat1)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, cv(hs0)), cbc, cv(hs0)))), wcel(nat1, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0))
  1nn0()
  nnm1nn0(c0)
  bcxmas(hs0, nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  comraddd(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  ppncand(nat1, nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cbc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  nnnn0(c0)
  bcp1m1(c0)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  joinlmuladdmuld(c0, nat1, c0, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0), co(c0, cexp, nat2), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmul, c0), co(c0, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))
  sqval(c0)
  mulid2(c0)
  eqtr4d(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0)), nat0, csu(s0, emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  sumeq1d(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cv(s0), emptycls, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(co(nat1, cfz, c0), emptycls, co(nat1, cfz, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq2(c0, nat0, nat1, cfz)
  fz10()
  sum0(s0, cv(s0))
  syl6eq(co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2), nat0, co(nat0, cdiv, nat2), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), cdiv, nat2, nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0), nat0, co(nat0, caddc, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, c0, nat0, nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  sq0i(c0)
  id(wceq(c0, nat0))
  00id()
  div0i(nat2)
  2cn()
  2ne0()
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn))
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(nat1, cmin, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, c0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: arisum2
blocks.content: Arithmetic series sum of the first ` N ` nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm arisum2(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  eqtrd(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(nat0, caddc, csu(s0, co(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  fsum1p(s0, nat0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), cv(s0), nat0, wcel(c0, cn))
  syl6eleq(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, nat0), cn0, wcel(c0, cn))
  nn0uz()
  nn0cnd(cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  elfznn0(cv(s0), co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  eqtrd(co(nat0, caddc, csu(s0, co(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0))), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl5eqr(co(nat0, caddc, csu(s0, co(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0))), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(nat0, caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq2i(nat0, caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), csu(s0, co(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)))
  sumeq1i(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0), co(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  oveq1i(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(nat0, caddc, nat1))
  1e0p1()
  addid2d(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  fsumcl(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0), wcel(c0, cn))
  fzfid(nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  nncnd(cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  elfznn(cv(s0), co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  eqtrd(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0))
  nnm1nn0(c0)
  arisum(s0, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  oveq1d(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), co(co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, c0), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1, co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cmin, c0), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0), co(c0, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  2timesd(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  subsub4d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), c0, c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  binom2sub1(c0)
  subsubd(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  npcand(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  subcld(co(c0, cexp, nat2), c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  sqcld(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  ax-1cn()
  subcl(c0, nat1)
  eqtr4d(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0)), nat0, csu(s0, emptycls, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  sumeq1d(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cv(s0), emptycls, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), emptycls, co(nat0, cfz, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cmin, nat1), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq1(c0, nat0, cmin, nat1)
  mpbi(wceq(co(nat0, cfz, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), emptycls), wbr(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0))
  ax-mp(wbr(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  ltm1(nat0)
  mp2an(wb(wbr(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0), wceq(co(nat0, cfz, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), emptycls)), wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), cz))
  ax-mp(wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  peano2zm(nat0)
  fzn(nat0, co(nat0, cmin, nat1))
  sum0(s0, cv(s0))
  syl6eq(co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), nat0, co(nat0, cdiv, nat2), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2, nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syl6eq(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0), nat0, co(nat0, cmin, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, c0, nat0, nat0, wceq(c0, nat0))
  sq0i(c0)
  id(wceq(c0, nat0))
  0m0e0()
  div0i(nat2)
  2cn()
  2ne0()
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: trireciplem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ trirecip . Show that the sum converges. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm trireciplem(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cli, nat1)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
} = {
  breqtri(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cli, nat1, co(nat1, cmin, nat0))
  mptru(wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cli, co(nat1, cmin, nat0)))
  climsubc2(hs0, cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), nat1, nat0, cn, nat1, cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), universe, wtru)
  divcnvshft(hs0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cn, nat1, nat1, nat1, universe, wtru)
  1zzd(wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), universe))
  mptex(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  nnex()
  1cnd(wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), universe))
  seqex(nat1, caddc, c0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cv(hs0)), cc, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  recnd(co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  nnrecred(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  3eqtr2rd(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, c0), cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cmin, cfv(cmpt(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cv(hs0))), co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), csu(hs1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs1), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))

blocks.name: trirecip
blocks.content: The sum of the reciprocals of the triangle numbers converge to two. This is Metamath 100 proof #42. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm trirecip(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), nat2)
} = {
  3eqtri(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), nat2, csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))), co(nat2, cmul, nat1))
  sumeq2i(s0, cn, co(nat2, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), co(nat2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  divrecd(nat2, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  2cnd(wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nncnd(co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnne0d(co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  mptru(wceq(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))), co(nat2, cmul, nat1)))
  eqtr3d(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))), co(nat2, cmul, nat1), co(nat2, cmul, csu(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))), wtru)
  isummulc2(s0, nat2, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), nat1, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wtru)
  syl(wtru, wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cli, nat1))
  releldmi(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cli, nat1)
  climrel()
  2cnd(wtru)
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, csu(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), nat1, wtru)
  isumclim(s0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), nat1, nat1, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wtru)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  fvmpt(hs0, cv(s0), cn, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cv(s0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), caddc, nat1)
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), cc))
  recnd(co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnrecred(co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  mpdan(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), cn), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(cv(s0))
  nnmulcl(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))
  a1i(wtru, wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cli, nat1))
  trireciplem(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))
  2t1e2()
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, cn, co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cdiv, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
}
